frontmatter.title: Eclipse Adoptium Projects Ready for Community Review
frontmatter.description: Community Review is the last step before we can officially start Eclipse Adoptium. It gives all of you an opportunity to ask questions, suggest improvements, or raise concerns. We also have an update to our transition roadmap.
frontmatter.author: tsc

frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK Reaches 200 Million Downloads
frontmatter.description: Today the AdoptOpenJDK project celebrates another huge milestone.
frontmatter.author: georgeadams

frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK Virtual Roadshow
frontmatter.description: Join the AdoptOpenJDK virtual roadshow as we speak at a JUG near you!
frontmatter.author: georgeadams

frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK to join the Eclipse Foundation
frontmatter.description: AdoptOpenJDK will join the Eclipse Foundation and rebrand as Adoptium.
frontmatter.author: tsc
